Uses of Class
com.polarion.alm.ws.client.types.tracker.WorkflowAction

  • Packages that use WorkflowAction 
    Package Description
    com.polarion.alm.ws.client.tracker  

    • Uses of WorkflowAction in com.polarion.alm.ws.client.tracker

      Methods in com.polarion.alm.ws.client.tracker that return WorkflowAction 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WorkflowAction[] TrackerWebService.getAvailableActions(java.lang.String workitemURI)
      Gets the actions that can be used on the workflow object in its current state.
      WorkflowAction TrackerWebService.getInitialWorkflowAction(java.lang.String workitemURI)
      Gets the initial workflow action for the specified object, returns null if there is no initial action for the corresponding workflow.
      WorkflowAction TrackerWebService.getInitialWorkflowActionForProjectAndType(java.lang.String projectId, EnumOptionId wiType)
      Gets the initial workflow action for a specific work item type in specific project.
      WorkflowAction[] TrackerWebService.getUnavailableActions(java.lang.String workitemURI)
      Gets the actions that can not be used on the work item in the current state because of unsatisfied condition(s).
